title: 先进生物生成控制
txt_content: 在国外curse上看到了这个mod，作者说mod的用法写在wiki上，谁知道这个mod的wiki？http://www.curse.com/mc-mods/minecraft/236053-advanced-spawn-control

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
{:10_495:}根本没开始写（我猜的）
因为我去了Minecraft Forum 他发的综合贴内并没有任何Wiki连接（所有Mod的介绍都很清洁，嘛3~4行）
除 Dimensional Control Mod外。
http://www.minecraftforum.net/fo ... -bones-gamings-mods

“Advanced Spawn Control is a mod created to allow a greater range of flexibility to a modpack maker's ability to control what mobs spawn where. Features in Advanced spawn Control include dimension specific lists that allow diversity based on biome, entity type, and specific entities in a blacklist and whitelist format.” 这介绍其实也差不多了，起码我们知道需要修改黑名单和白名单上的entity即可。
entity肯定和原版一样所以...
